predJson.name: Donepezil 23mg SR vs 10mg IR - SAE within 24 weeks (OneFlorida)

outcomeCohort.name: Serious Adverse Event (CTCAE grade 3-5) within 24 weeks

timeAtRisks.description: SAE within 24 weeks after first donepezil prescription (primary TAR)

analysis specifications.name: Radical cystectomy vs trimodality therapy - metastasis and survival

conceptsToInclude.name: Clinical T-stage (cT2 vs cT3 or cT4)
Smoking history (never vs current or former)

timeAtRisks.description: From date of diagnosis (cohort start) to end of follow-up (intent-to-treat style)

psSettings.description: Inverse probability of treatment weighting (IPTW) with stabilised weights

predJson.name: Low-dose erythromycin vs no erythromycin in sepsis (MARS cohort)

comparatorCohort.name: No low-dose erythromycin within exposure window

outcomeCohort.name: Change in mSOFA from admission to day 4 (Î”SOFA)

conceptsToInclude.name: Source of infection (abdominal, pulmonary, urinary, cardiovascular, skin, CNS, other/unknown)
Gastrointestinal Failure score (dichotomized: absent vs present)

timeAtRisks.description: TAR after 72-h exposure window (primary analysis): follow from 72 hours after ICU admission to 90 days after ICU admission
TAR after 48-h exposure window (sensitivity analysis): follow from 48 hours after ICU admission to 90 days after ICU admission
TAR after 96-h exposure window (sensitivity analysis): follow from 96 hours after ICU admission to 90 days after ICU admission
TAR 30 to 90 days after ICU admission (secondary period analysis)

conceptsToInclude.name: Systolic blood pressure at day 0 (or closest)

timeAtRisks.description: 25-day follow-up from treatment start (intent-to-treat style to ensure full follow-up)

psSettings.description: Primary PS: logistic regression predicting emulated intervention including specified baseline covariates; continuous variables modelled using restricted cubic splines with 3 knots at 10th, 50th and 90th percentiles. PS will be used for covariate-adjustment in outcome model (PS entered as spline terms).
Sensitivity PS: same model but restricted cubic spline knots placed at 25th, 50th and 75th percentiles (sensitivity to knot placement).

predJson.name: First-line SGLT-2i vs Metformin - Cardiovascular Outcomes

outcomeCohort.name: Hospitalization for ischemic or hemorrhagic stroke

timeAtRisks.description: Primary on-treatment (grace period 60 days between refills)
Intention-to-treat (carry forward initial exposure for 365 days)

psSettings.description: PS matching 1:2 using logistic regression; caliper = 0.001 SD of logit(PS); matching performed within calendar time blocks and balancing baseline CVD (exact match on baseline CVD applied in matching strata)
